content.raw:
Great job @scpeters ! Dmesg in our master machine shows:

```
[8978893.740300] Out of memory: Kill process 8021 (transport_stres) score 587 or sacrifice child
[8978893.740326] Killed process 8021 (transport_stres) total-vm:2524580kB, anon-rss:1483740kB, file-rss:0kB
```

Seems like the problem is the big amounts of memory needed to run the transport stress test. Let's give it a look and see if:

* There is a memory leak
* We can transform this test to not to consume this amount of memory.
content.html:
Great job @scpeters ! Dmesg in our master machine shows:

[8978893.740300] Out of memory: Kill process 8021 (transport_stres) score 587 or sacrifice child
[8978893.740326] Killed process 8021 (transport_stres) total-vm:2524580kB, anon-rss:1483740kB, file-rss:0kB

Seems like the problem is the big amounts of memory needed to run the transport stress test. Let's give it a look and see if:

  • There is a memory leak
  • We can transform this test to not to consume this amount of memory.
